name: test_e2e_with_logs[634_API_OAUTH_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `API_OAUTH_001` |
| **Name** | OAuth redirect_uri manipulation |
| **Category** | API_SECURITY |
| **Subcategory** | oauth |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `redirect_uri=http://evil.com/callback`
- **Encoded**: `redirect_uri%3Dhttp%3A%2F%2Fevil.com%2Fcallback`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~28000ms
- **Timestamp**: 11:36:49.000 UTC

| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
